ygData.subject: Re: Human SK god and stats?
ygData.msgSnippet: Human SKs of Bertoxxulous do indeed start in Qeynos. The karana residents hate you though, so dont think hunting in them will be all that much easier, you just
ygData.messageBody:
Human SKs of Bertoxxulous do indeed start in Qeynos.
The karana residents hate you though, so dont think
hunting in them will be all that much easier, you just
wont have to worry about the guards. And i couldnt
step foot into Qeynos Hills without either Holly
Windstalker or Lars Mcmannus killing me.And if Cross
Treewind gets you in his sights, youre done for.
But fixing faction with the guards of Qeynos was
extremely easy. Lots and lots of gnolls.
We can freely train in Freeport.Both the Militia and
Paladins are Dubious at first. But the Militia faction
i seemed to fix rather quickly.
We can enter Neriak,most are Dubious. But we cant
train. They dislike us because we are human. The only
KoS seem to be the Warriors. Even the ogres and trolls
in the foreign section dont attack.
The bouncers in Feerrott attack. Not sure about the
trolls.

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Rich Hitz <rich.hitz@...> wrote:
> I was going to make a suggestion in the earlier
> post, but hit send to early.
> I would suggest creating a HSK of Innoruk and
> traveling to Neriak to see if
> you can train there. If not, then I'm not sure
> either choice is better.
> Cronik worships Thule. I am not entirely sure if it
> is racial or religious
> differances that prevent me from taining there. I am
> able to train in
> Freeport though. I have yet to go into Oggok other
> than to be bound in the
> entrance.
>
> Does worshiping Bertoxx make you start in Qeynos? I
> hate Freeport and would
> choose to start in Qeynos anyday of the year. I have
> not done this, so I
> also am not sure if the wandering Ranger NPCs will
> KoS you or not, though I
> think they will. But it does give you access to the
> Karanas without all the
> hassle that a DE or Troll has.
> As far as stats go, I think what you have in mind
> will work fine.
> Personally, I would increase them both by 10. But
> then again I don't know
> how much Agility affects AC after 20th either.
>
> --
> Akenar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
> 15th Season TSK
> Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
> Bertoxx
>
>
>
>

> both because of the
> crushing
> | EXP penalty, so I though I'd try out a human SK.
> A few questions:
> | |
> | | 1) What is the best god for HSK? Innoruuk or
> Bertox? Which cities can
> | each enter safely without having to kill anything?
> I'm assuming the human
> | cities plus High Hold for both, plus Neriak for
> Innoruuk SK's. Can either
> | safely enter a city on either Faydwer or Erudin?
> | |
> | | 2) Starting stats. I was thinking +5 Str and +
> 15 AGI to set each to
> 90.
> | Any thoughts on what a good Str value is. Should
> I bump it to 100. How
> | heavy is medium armor?
> | |
> | | Thanks for any input.
> | |
> | | Scragg Wraithbone (22nd TSK on Bristlebane)
> | | Scregg Wraithbone (7th TSK on Mith. Marr)
